page.title: 08...INFORMATION
page.content: Information about our area is found in {1}The Library {2}The Community Centre {3}Housing Centre {4} Parish Magazines. {1}The Library has 39,731 books of all kinds, also Consumer Advice pamphlets. About 300 people use the library each day. Librarians give advice and information about the area to people who need help.{2}Terry Davis M.P.,local councillors and a solicitor hold weekly meetings at the Community Centre to help with people's problems.Information boards containing D.H.S.S.and other advice pamphlets are available here as well as news of recreational activities and adult education. {3} The Housing Centre has information concerning Council Houses in the area. {4} Parish Magazines like the Shard End Star,The Herald as well as the Castle Bromwich Gazette give local news. A Citizen's Advice van also visits the area weekly.
